comments.body: i tried in hive 1.0.1 and  not found this exception
Recently some of these issues are fixed in HIVE-12551. Do you have small reproducible case that I can test and make sure HIVE-12551 fixes this issue?

where i can get the source of hive-exe-1.2.1
now i use maven  and how can i fixed by patch as you say some of these issues are fixed in HIVE-12551

you can show me hive-exe-1.2.1.jar which solved the problem of Kryo by email 752098131@qq.com
then i can test   make sure HIVE-12551 fixes this issue 
ok?
